channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-15957] Follow Hive's rules for type inference instead of Calcite
item.description: Mostly those rules are same, but in case they diverge we should pick Hive's rule for type inference.
item.summary: Follow Hive's rules for type inference instead of Calcite

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
